entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning early this morning and ending this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
